halloween.imSorry: I'm sorry if you were a bit scared!

task.title: Remove the points received by the respondents, when they answered the question

returnPoints.title: Don't give the points back to owner

giveWarning.title: Delete selected contents with a warning

personalNote.title: You can add a personal private note here and that will relate to this user only

You can add points by typing positive numbers like 123
or
you can remove points by typing negative numbers like -123

notificationMessages.shortLinkSuccessMessage: Short link has been created and copied to clipboard(CTRL + C)
notificationMessages.cannotFindUser: I couldn't find the user with entered ID number
notificationMessages.idNumberRequired: You need to enter an ID number
notificationMessages.openABrainlyPage: You need to open a Brainly page in your browser
notificationMessages.preparingUnsuccessful: An error occurred while preparing the delete reasons and fetching from Brainly
notificationMessages.noEvidenceFound: Moderator didn't add any evidence nor comment
notificationMessages.doYouWannaGiveThisPrivilege: Do you wanna give this privilege to all extension users?
notificationMessages.doYouWannaRevokeThisPrivilege: Do you wanna revoke this privilege from all extension users?
notificationMessages.incorrectDate:
I'm unable to fetch your data from Brainly

createShortLinkButton.title: Create a short link for this web page

themeColor.title: Theme Color
themeColor.colorFormatInfo: You can set theme color with Hex color codes. I mean, you need to set #FF0000 for the red color

quickDeleteButtons.title: You can set delete reasons of the quick delete buttons

extendMessagesLayout.title: This option will extend the layout of the messages page. You can try it when the messages page is opened

notifier.title: Extension will toast a notification you when you have a new message or new notification on Brainly

users.title: You can set the extension user's permission and privileges
users.addNewOrEditUser: Add a new or edit extension user
users.hasntUsed: User hasn't used the extension yet

explainingColors.line1: Some users have colored border in their avatars and this colors shows that their access permission status of the extension.
explainingColors.line2: <s>Red</s> border means that shown user are banned from the extension.
explainingColors.line3: <s>Mustard</s> border means the user has permission to use the extension but hasn't started use it yet
explainingColors.line4: <s>Green</s> color means the user is an active authorized user.
explainingColors.line5: <s>No border</s> means that user has some privileges assigned but not given permission to use the extension in their account and hasn't started to use the extension yet.

0.title: Extension admin
0.description: Can able use the extension without any restriction. (No need to assign any other privileges, this will remove all restrictions)

1.title: Quick delete questions
1.description: On the pages of questions, archive mod and homepage, user can use the quick delete buttons for deleting the question/s

2.title: Quick delete answers
2.description: On the pages of questions, archive mod and homepage, user can use the quick delete buttons for deleting the answers

4.title: Announcement management
4.description: Can create, edit, remove or publish the internal extension announcements

5.title: Manage extension users
5.description: Can add or editing the extension users and give them privileges or permission to use the extension

6.title: Selective answer approvement
6.description: On the user contents page, user can approve or unapprove the answers by selecting

7.title: Mass-Content deleter
7.description: In the moderation panel, user can use this function for deleting multiple questions/answers/comments from Brainly

8.title: Group messages
8.description: In the messages page, user can send private messages to multiple users in a group at once

9.title: Mass-Message sender
9.description: In the moderation panel, user can use this function for sending a private message to entire users of your market

10.title: Supervisors page, Message sender
10.description: In the supervisors page, user can send a private message to listed moderators or all moderators of your market

11.title: Delete reasons preferences management
11.description: Can set warning level of delete reasons

12.title: Account delete reports
12.description: In the extension options, user can see account deletion reports

13.title: Mass-Point changer
13.description: In the moderation panel, user can change user's points by their ids

14.title: Selective question deletion
14.description: On the user contents and question searching page, user can use the selective deletion function to delete selected questions

15.title: Selective answer deletion
15.description: On the user contents page, user can use the selective deletion function to delete selected answers

16.title: Selective comment deletion
16.description: On the user contents page, user can use the selective deletion function to delete selected comments

17.title: Reported comments deleter
17.description: User can use this function to delete all the reported comments from Moderate all

18.title: Mass-Moderate reported contents
18.description: User can use this function to confirm/delete reported contents massively from the Moderate all by filtering

19.title: Selective ask for correction
19.description: On the user contents page, user can use the selective ask for correction to report answers

21.title: Review user privileges
21.description: User can review other extension users privileges without making any changes

22.title: Can change access permission
22.description: User can manage permissions to use the extension

23.title: Can change important privilege
23.description: User can assign/revoke important privileges to other extension users

24.title: Can change less important privilege
24.description: User can assign/revoke less important privileges to extension users

25.title: Can change harmless privilege
25.description: User can assign/revoke harmless privileges to other extension users

26.title: Selective question deletion(Multiple pages)
26.description: On the question searching page, user can use the selective deletion function to delete selected questions from multiple pages at once

27.title: Mass-Manage users
27.description: User can use this function to manage users massively. Like, changing a list of users points or approve answers of users or etc.

28.title: Mod. Action H. Approval
28.description: User can use this function to report- actions of moderators from moderator actions history page.

45.title: Quick delete comments
45.description: On the pages of questions and archive mod, user can use the quick delete buttons for deleting the comments

29.title: Mass-Moderate contents
29.description: User can use this function to moderate contents massively

30.title: Approve all answers
30.description: User can use this function to approve all answers of users massively by providing list of ids/links of users

31.title: Delete users
31.description: User can use this function to delete users massively by providing list of ids/links of users

32.title: Change points
32.description: User can use this function to change points of users massively by providing list of ids/links of users

33.title: Change ranks
33.description: User can use this function to change ranks of users massively by providing list of ids/links of users

34.title: Point transferer req.
34.description: User can use the "Mark as point transferer" button to mark a user that uses some point transferring methods to gain points

DeleteReasonsPreferences.withAsk: Show confirmation dialog while deleting a content

explaining.line1: You can find delete reasons by typing the name of the reason
explaining.line2: After selecting one from the results, you can click %{exclamation-circle} button to give warning without asking confirmation from moderators while they are deleting a content. But in some cases, that may can change and moderators should decide if giving a warning is necessary or not. So you can click %{exclamation-triangle} to show confirmation dialog to moderators while they are deleting a content.

notificationMessages.cantFetchDeleteReasons: An unexpected error occurred while trying to prepare delete reasons
notificationMessages.extensionServerError: An unexpected error occurred while connecting the extension server. Please try again in ~5 sec.
notificationMessages.ifErrorPersists: If this error persists, please contact with extension manager and explain what happened :)
notificationMessages.accessPermissionDenied:
Your are not authorized to use Brainly Tools.
Please contact with an admin or extension manager
notificationMessages.updateNeeded: Extension has a new version and browser need's to be updated. This will be done automatically and you need to refresh the page in ~10 seconds
notificationMessages.warningBeforeDelete:
This process will be executed and the numbers of questions ids in the input will be deleted once you confirmed this warning. 

 Are you triple times sure?
notificationMessages.enterIdWarn: You need to add at least 1 id number of question that you want to delete
notificationMessages.youNeedToEnterValidId: You need to enter a valid id number
notificationMessages.tryingToSendTheSameMessage: You're trying to send the last message again. Do you still want to send?
notificationMessages.thisConditionAlreadyAddedInCommonConditi: This condition already added in the Common conditions
notificationMessages.youNeedToRemoveThePreviousFilterFirst: You need to remove previously added content type filter from the filter list first
notificationMessages.couldntAbleToGetNoticeBoardContent: I couldn't able to get content of notice board
notificationMessages.changesMayNotBeSaved: Changes you made may not be saved
notificationMessages.youCantAddMoreThan8Sections: You can't add more than 8 sections
notificationMessages.stillProcessing:
This section is still in process. Do you want to remove this block?
(this will stop the moderating process)
notificationMessages.youNeedToChooseActionType: You need to choose an action type
notificationMessages.errorOccurredWhileDeletingTheN: An error occurred while deleting the %{content_id}

MassContentDeleter.containerExplanation: You need to put content links or ids to text box line by line. Each line should contain 1 id number

MessageSender.information: This function can send your message to the users by counting backwards from the given id number. Once you've start the process and if you want to send the message to the id numbers, you should have to wait and not close this page(this includes your computer as well) till the process finishes.

announcements.title: Once you've read the announcement you need to mark it as read

pointChanger.enterOrPasteUID: Enter or paste user profile ID
pointChanger.youNeedToEnterOrPaste: You need to enter user id or you can paste copied list of user ids into input
pointChanger.pastingExample2: Also, you can specify the points in the list before copy paste

reportedCommentsDeleter.description: You can delete all reported comments in Moderate All with one click. You just need to start and keep this tab open that's all.

massModerateReportedContents.fetchedReports: Count of fetched reports from Moderate all
massModerateReportedContents.informationText1: You can confirm reported contents from Moderate All by filtering. You just need to select and add conditions related the content and click start and keep this tab open that's all.
massModerateReportedContents.informationText2: You can use common conditions section to apply specific conditions to all unique conditions.
massModerateReportedContents.informationText3: But adding all conditions to common section, will not match with any reports. You need to use the unique conditions to match.
massModerateReportedContents.informationText4: Once you have set conditions, please check the matched reports and ensure before confirming.

commonConditions.title: Conditions that you will be adding to this section will be applied with all extra conditions

conditionN.title: This unique condition will be restricted from other unique conditions

byReporter.title: Reporter means, the person that who was reported the question or answer

byReportee.title: Reportee means, the person that who is the owner of the reported question or answer

notificationMessages.doYouReallyWantToRemoveAllUsers: Do you really want to remove all users from the list?

tabButton.title: Add an answer to target questions
